Package main

Class Match

java.lang.Object
main.Match
public class Match extends Object
The Match class describes a match against an opposing team.
Version:
1.1, May 2023.
Author:
Lachlan Stewart and Stephen Hockey

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    faceoffIndex
    Keeps track of what index in each team of athlete should be facing off.
    private ArrayList<Integer>
    matchStaminas
    An ArrayList to keep track of the user's athlete's staminas in the current match.
    private Team
    opposingTeam
    The opposing team
    private int[][]
    scores
    A 5x2 integer array that holds all five set's scores.
    private int
    setNumber
    The current set, 0-indexed
    private int[]
    setScore
    The overall set score e.g [2, 3], in which case, the opposing team won 3 sets to 2.

  • Field Details

    • matchStaminas

      private ArrayList<Integer> matchStaminas
      An ArrayList to keep track of the user's athlete's staminas in the current match.

    • opposingTeam

      private Team opposingTeam
      The opposing team

    • setNumber

      private int setNumber
      The current set, 0-indexed

    • scores

      private int[][] scores
      A 5x2 integer array that holds all five set's scores. An unplayed set will be represented by the array [0, 0]

    • setScore

      private int[] setScore
      The overall set score e.g [2, 3], in which case, the opposing team won 3 sets to 2.

    • faceoffIndex

      private int faceoffIndex
      Keeps track of what index in each team of athlete should be facing off. Increments by 1 with every point. Initialised to 0 at the beginning of each set.

  • Constructor Details

      Constructs a new Match object at the beginning of the match with the given opposingTeam.

      newOpposingTeam - the opposing team

    • getScoreString

      public String getScoreString()
      Gets the Match object's current set's score in a formatted String, e.g 3 - 16
      Returns:
      the current set's score as a String

    • getSetScoreString

      public String getSetScoreString()
      Gets the Match object's set score as a formatted String, e.g 2 - 0
      Returns:
      the set score as a String

    • playPoint

      public boolean playPoint()
      Compares the players in the faceoff and accordingly determines the winner of the point, and decreases the user's athlete's stamina stat - by 1 if point won, and by 2 if point lost.
      Returns:
      false if an injury occurred that needs to be dealt with by what calls this method.

    • checkIfSetOver

      public boolean checkIfSetOver()
      Checks if either team has won the current set, then updates the scores accordingly if so.
      Returns:
      true if current set has been won/lost

    • getMatchRating

      public int getMatchRating()
      Gets a rating value for the match that depends on game difficulty, and how well the match went.
      Returns:
      the match rating

    • getMoneyWon

      public int getMoneyWon()
      Gets the money won from the match. $0 if match lost. If match won, the amount depends on game difficulty, and how good the set score is.
      Returns:
      money won

    • matchWon

      public boolean matchWon()
      Checks if the user won this match.
      Returns:
      true if user has won 3 sets
